CustomField.formula: (Alipay_of_Total__c * Payments_Annual_Value__c * (Alipay__c - Payment_Card_Charge__r.Chinese_Wallets__c)) + (Union_Pay_of_Total__c * Payments_Annual_Value__c * (Union_Pay__c - Payment_Card_Charge__r.UnionPay__c)) + ( WeChat_of_Total__c * Payments_Annual_Value__c * (WeChat__c - Payment_Card_Charge__r.Chinese_Wallets__c) + Pay_by_Link_Annual_GP__c)
CustomField.label: Total Wallet Opportunity
